Welcome to the website of the *Workshop on Experimental Phonetics Tools*.

Please, carefully read the following pre-workshop set-up instructions.

## Pre-worshop set-up

You will need to bring your laptop to the workshop with the following software already installed:

- Latest version of [Praat](https://www.fon.hum.uva.nl/praat/).

- The [Montreal Forced Aligner](https://montreal-forced-aligner.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started.html).

- The Praat plugin [Fast Track](https://github.com/santiagobarreda/FastTrack/wiki/Installation) (use the Lazy layout).

Please, download the workshop materials from <https://github.com/uoelel/WEPhT/releases>: you should download the `WEPhT.zip` ZIP archive. Make sure you unzip the archive once it's downloaded.

If you have never used the command line, you can learn the fundamentals here: <https://builtin.com/software-engineering-perspectives/terminal-commands>.
